title: Why did Avatar make so much money in theaters? - Quora

response.answer_text: Of course because Avatar did something that no movie did at the time, it brought the 3D technology to another level and successfully made everyone want to experience it in theaters. It was a standalone movie meaning no previous films needed to be watched to understand it. It also wasn't an R-rated film, so people of any age can go watch it at any time whenever they please to.Didn't have a fan base or a limited of fans like other franchise which makes it unpredictable to know how it would turn out.Since it didn't have a fan base, no one expected much from it or knew anything about it before, until everyone actually watched it in theaters.It was culturally accepted and had such an universal appeal which all caused CRAZY REPEAT VIEWINGS!!

“ Avatar” made so much money due to following reason Movie was in 3D ( it was something people that people hadn't seen in many years)Prices of tickets were High ( due to Imax and 3D effect and people were still watching)It was based on morden myth and Nature ( which is common all over the world)It makes us Aware that we are destroying and exploiting our Nature ( this is something which is felt by every person on this universe so it was relatable to everyone)It spread worldwide
